attributes.action: stop answering  E-Petitions with white wash
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I  have signed many E-Petitions over the past few months many of which I feel have not been adequately answered by this government in some cases their response has been very obscure. I feel its about time that this government starts to answer E-Petitions with tailored responses stating what actions they intend to take to deal with highlighted issues in E-Petitions. If this government will not address the issues raised within the E-Petitions it is pointless having and electronic E-Petitions system.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
